## About

Collection of 50+ type, feature & value checks.

### Status

**STABLE** - used in production

## Installation

```bash
yarn add @thi.ng/checks
```

Package sizes (gzipped): ESM: 1.3KB / CJS: 1.5KB / UMD: 1.3KB
